title: Speak with Dead
content:
Speak with Dead Level 3 Necromancy Spell Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions. Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell. Doesn't work on Undead. 9m Action Level 3 Spell Slot
